tablesalt.running module¶

Created on Tue Jan 15 16:29:25 2019

@author: alkj

class tablesalt.running.ProgressBar¶

Bases: threading.Thread

In a separate thread, print dots to the screen until terminated.

run()¶

run and print the dots to the cmd line

stop()¶

stop the progress dots

class tablesalt.running.WindowsInhibitor¶

Bases: object

Prevent OS sleep/hibernate in windows

ES_CONTINUOUS = 2147483648¶
ES_SYSTEM_REQUIRED = 1¶
inhibit()¶

start the windows inhibitor

uninhibit()¶

stop the windows inhibitor

tablesalt.running.banner(text, chrc='=', length=70)¶

prints a banner to the cmd line

tablesalt.running.calculate_file_progress(path, final, extension=None)¶

calculates and prints the % of files in a directory

Module contents¶

TBST Trafik, Bygge, og Bolig -styrelsen

Package for revenue distribution based on pendler kombi rejsekort

The goal is to use pendler kombi rejsekort users as a proxy for the more traditional pendler cards to determine the average zone shares for operators for each zone combination that pendler users may have

Author: Alan Jones alkj@tbst.dk, alanksjones@gmail.com

© Copyright 2021, Alan Jones

Built with Sphinx using a theme provided by Read the Docs.
